data.name: AlignAndRise
data.value: Согласование с исходной точкой и подъем на целевую высоту: {0} м
data.comment: Message shown when cmdr needs to rise up to a suitable altitude for aerial assistance mode {0} int, altitude in metres
data.source: Align with site origin and rise to target altitude: {0}m

data.name: AlignWithButtress
data.comment: Message shown when the site needs to be identified by aligning with a specific buttress

data.name: ChooseAbsent
data.comment: Selectable option shown in a box, chosen by matching a fire-group

data.name: ChooseEmpty
data.comment: Selectable option shown in a box, chosen by matching a fire-group

data.name: ChoosePresent
data.comment: Selectable option shown in a box, chosen by matching a fire-group

data.name: FooterActiveObeliskGroups
data.comment: Footer showing which obelisks groups are present {0} string, list of obelisk group names eg "C, D, Q, T"

data.name: FooterToggleModeOnce
data.value: (Переключите режим кабины один раз, чтобы установить)
data.comment: Footer hint telling cmdr how to take a measurement

data.name: FooterToggleModeTwice
data.comment: Footer hint telling cmdr how to take a measurement

data.name: HeaderUnknownSiteType
data.comment: Header with site type is unknown

data.name: LineRamTahAcquired
data.comment: Line shown when log has already been acquired for Ram Tah mission

data.name: LineRamTahNeeded
data.comment: Line shown when log is needed for Ram Tah mission

data.name: MatsFullOne
data.value: (Коврики стража заполнены - снова переключите режим кабины, чтобы отметить отсканированное)
data.comment: Message hint shown when cmdrs Guardian mats are full
data.source: (Guardian mats full - toggle cockpit mode again to mark scanned)

data.name: MatsFullTwo
data.value: (Коврики Стража заполнены - дважды переключите режим кабины, чтобы отметить отсканированный)
data.comment: Following up hint shown when cmdrs Guardian mats are full
data.source: (Guardian mats full - toggle cockpit mode twice to mark scanned)

data.name: NearObeliskHeader
data.comment: Header shown when cmdr is near an obeslisk {0} string, the id name of the obelisk, eg "G12" {1} string, the status of the obelisk, eg "Active"

data.name: NoNearPoiHeader
data.value: Переместитесь в пределах ~75 м, чтобы осмотреть товар
data.comment: Header shown when cmdr is not near any POI
data.source: Move within ~75m to inspect an item

data.name: ObeliskActive
data.comment: The state of an obelisk

data.name: ObeliskBroken
data.comment: The state of an obelisk

data.name: ObeliskInactive
data.comment: The state of an obelisk

data.name: OnApproachFooter
data.value: ( Не забудьте поставить 3 огневые группы на кораблях и СР )
data.comment: Footer shown when on approach to a Guardian site
data.source: ( Don't forget to set 3 fire groups in ships and SRVs )

data.name: OnApproachHeaderRuins
data.comment: Header when approaching a Ruins

data.name: OnApproachHeaderStructure
data.comment: Header when approaching a Structure

data.name: OnApproachMiddleRuins
data.comment: Middle text when approaching a Ruins {0} int, the 1 based index of the site {1} string, the type of Ruins, eg: Alpha, Beta or Gamma

data.name: OnApproachMiddleStructure
data.comment: Middle text when approaching a Stucture {0} string, the structure type name, eg: Stickhand {1} string, which blue print is available

data.name: OnApproachMiddleStructureNoBluePrint
data.comment: Middle text when approaching a Stucture that does not provide blue prints {0} string, the structure type name, eg: Stickhand

data.name: RelicTowerFaceHint
data.value: Повернитесь лицом к стороне одним большим треугольником, обращенным влево.
data.comment: Message hint for which side of a relic tower to measure from
data.source: Face the side with a single large left facing triangle.

data.name: RelicTowerFootHint
data.comment: Footer hint shown to remind cmdr's how to force an update when on foot

data.name: RelicTowerHeadingKnown
data.comment: Message shown when relic tower heading is already known

data.name: RelicTowerNonToolHint
data.value: Используйте анализатор профиля рядом с башнями реликвий для помощи в прицеливании. Повернитесь лицом к стороне одним большим треугольником, обращенным влево.
data.comment: Message hint for which tool and side of a relic tower to use
data.source: Use Profile Analyser near Relic Towers for aiming assistance. Face the side with a single large left facing triangle.

data.name: RequiresPrefix
data.comment: Line header telling cmdr what items are required to scan this obelisk for Ram Tah mission

data.name: RequiresSuffix
data.comment: Line suffix telling cmdr what they get if they scan this obelisk during Ram Tah mission {0} string, name of some log

data.name: ToggleLightsUpdateHint
data.comment: Footer hint shown to remind cmdr's how to force an update

data.name: ToggleShieldsForRelicTower
data.value: Переключите щиты, чтобы задать направление к Реликтовой башне.
data.comment: Message shown to help taking relic tower headings
data.source: Toggle shields to set Relic Tower heading.

data.name: YouHaveNotScanned
data.comment: Footer hint telling cmdr if they have scanned an obelisk
data.source: You have not scanned this obelisk

data.name: YouHaveScanned
data.comment: Footer hint telling cmdr if they have scanned an obelisk
